snippet: Does it matter which Republican wins the party's nomination? For that matter, do you think it matters for the world which candidate wins the U.S. election in November, President Obama or his Republican challenger? (If you want, you can follow the...
abstract: Does it matter which Republican wins the party's nomination? For that matter, do you think it matters for the world which candidate wins the U.S. election in November, President Obama or his Republican challenger? (If you want, you can follow the Republican delegate tally.)

headline.main: Your Say: How Much Attention Are You Paying to the Republican Primaries?
